mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WHISPER (whisperSeq, sender, receiver, sendDate, message, whisperType, visible, RESERVEDATE, SENDERNICKNAME) VALUES (whisperSeq.nextval, #{sender}, #{receiver}, SYSDATE, #{message}, #{whisperType}, #{visible}, #{reserveDate}, #{senderNickname})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM WHISPER WHERE receiver = #{userId} AND VISIBLE = 1 ORDER BY sendDate DESC
